lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: I think it's about time to introduce a couple of good friends to the party!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: They love to dance, but you gotta stay on your toes too!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Between their funky moves they might take a swipe at ya!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Yes! Yes! The energy is INCREDIBLE!!!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: That's what I like to hear! Time for your victory lap, Nuck!
